member.name: M:Notifications.Api.Controllers.CompanyController.CreateCompanyAsync(Notifications.Application.DTOs.CompanyCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates company CompanyTypeCode -> (s)small, (m) medium, (l)large CompanyMarketCode -> (DK) Denmark, (NO) Norway, (SE) Sweden, (FI) Finland
